QuestData.Title: Bring Me The Egg!
QuestData.Description: Now that you've been initiated, I want you to get me that egg! Use the Jump-a-tron and try to hit the nest dead center. But be careful! Bodily injury or serious permanent damage may occur from a bad jump.
QuestData.LogDescription: Wazat in Nagrand wants you to use the Jump-a-tron 4000 to get to the nest in the nearby tree and steal the Mysterious Egg.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did I mention my love for eggs?
QuestData.RewardText: Well, it's no egg... Hey! I love chicken too! I'll just chomp right through this ginourmous talon! Thanks!
